page.description: RTF Methods and Properties in Alpha Anywhere.

property.name: Object Name
property.description: The name of the control. Setup Property

property.name: Enable during view
property.description: Determines whether the user can read the RTF text in the pop-up editor. Setup Property

property.name: Show scroll bars
property.description: Determines whether scroll bars will appear when the pop-up editor appears. Setup Property

property.name: Allow growth when printing
property.description: Determines whether the control can be expanded when printing. Setup Property

property.name: Allow shrink when printing
property.description: Determines whether the control can be reduced when printing. Setup Property

property.name: Hide
property.description: Determines whether the control is visible. Setup Property

property.name: Always on top
property.description: Determines whether the control will always be placed on top of other objects in the same location. Setup Property

property.name: Border Style
property.description: Sets the border line style. Border Property

property.name: Border Color
property.description: Sets the border line color (using a color name or RGB value ). Border Property

property.name: Border Width
property.description: The width of the border line in pixels. Border Property

property.name: Show Left, Right, Top, Bottom
property.description: For edge shape "Square" determines which sides of the rectangle will display. For other edge shapes, determines which corners will be square or styled. Border Property
property.example: :formname.controlname.border.has_bottom_edge as L :formname.controlname.border.has_left_edge as L :formname.controlname.border.has_right_edge as L :formname.controlname.border.has_top_edge as L

property.name: Shadow Style
property.description: Determines how much the shadow will be offset and its degree of shading. Border Property

property.name: Shadow Color
property.description: Sets the shadow color (using a color name or RGB value ). Border Property

property.name: Background Style
property.description: The fill color mode and translucency of the control's background. Border Property

property.name: Fill
property.description: The style and color(s) of the control's background. Border Property
property.example: :formname.controlname.fill.backcolor as C :formname.controlname.fill.forecolor as C :formname.controlname.fill.style as C

property.name: Left
property.description: Sets the horizontal position of the control. Dimension Property

property.name: Top
property.description: Sets the vertical position of the control. Dimension Property

property.name: Width
property.description: Sets the width of the control. Dimension Property

property.name: Height
property.description: Sets the height of the control. Dimension Property

property.name: Anchor
property.description: Determines the way the tabbed control will or will not stretch as the base form is resized. Possible attachment points are: 1 = top and right, 2 = top, left, and right, 4 = bottom and left, 5 = bottom and right, 6 = bottom, left, and right, 8 = top, bottom, and left, 9 = top, bottom, and right, 10 = top, bottom, left, and right. Dimension Property
